message.body: Hey Kennedy, this is Sheila. Can I text you tonight when I get done work to see about making the lamb?
Yes yes! You said after 10 right? I'll probably go over around 8 or 9 and then you can just come over whenevs. Thx for the futon last night!
Yeah probably after 10, but Ill let you know. Should I bring supplies? (I ask this, but I just watched our cardboard recycling go out an hour ago :( )
We have sooooo much cardboard. I think the only thing we will need is a big balloon (a punching balloon from the dollar store is usually best).
I'll try to get one tho, do don't worry bout it!
Hey I just got done. Should I head over? It's girard and 2nd, yeah?.
Front and girard. I'll be there in 15!
Can you bring yr car to the warehouse just in case? I think we have enough room for everyone but want to make sure! Thx!
Sure, im going to be a little late though. I have to pick up Mindy.
Any chance you can pick us up too? We have a lot of stuff.....agh, thanks!
So much love and hugs to you. So very sorry to hear about your mom. If we can do anything, let us know -xo Kennedy & Jeremy
